import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { removeproduct } from '../Redux/cartRedux'; import './CSS/Cartitems.css' const CartItems = ({item}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); function removeFromCart(){ dispatch(removeproduct({...item})) } return (
{item.brand}
{item.title}
₹{item.price}
×
) } export default CartItems
